thread.section_title: Zankyou opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre Zankyou | www.zankyou.com
thread.title: eraviglione13

author: eraviglione13
title: eraviglione13
text: We are getting married this summer and needed to create an international registry for our guests who live in different countries. We had some issues with merging the accounts and making them accessible to guests, but Louise was very helpful and patient from the start and she ensured we finalized our registry! Louise was responsive and provided really helpful solutions. Thank you!
